name: Crabby Claws
description:
Crabby Claws needs our help!!! Help save the ocean and our planet by dodging falling trash and other dangers! NO ADS! Original music and creative design.

Unlock 4 different crabs each with its own background and music. Compete with friends by comparing scores on the leaderboard! Have fun!

Credits:
Game design, programming, and music - Kylan O’Connor
Backgrounds and icons - Aidan Barcia-Bacon
